mapper.sql: device_id, lock_state, wifi_opne, ip, mask, gate, time_limit_door_open, time_limit_lock_open, door_alarm, fire_alarm, user_number, key_switch, company_id, company_name, data_uploadstate, rom_available_size, cpu_freq, cpu_temper, cpu_unilization, cpu_user_unilization, "internal_unilization ", app_used, time
mapper.insert: insert into device_heartbeat (device_id, lock_state, wifi_opne, ip, mask, gate, time_limit_door_open, time_limit_lock_open, door_alarm, fire_alarm, user_number, key_switch, company_id, company_name, data_uploadstate, rom_available_size, cpu_freq, cpu_temper, cpu_unilization, cpu_user_unilization, "internal_unilization ", app_used, time) values (#{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wifiOpne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mask,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeLimitDoorOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeLimitLockOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doorAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fireAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keySwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataUploadstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{romAvailableSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuTemper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpuUserUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{internalUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update device_heartbeat
lock_state = #{lockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wifi_opne = #{wifiOpne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mask = #{mask,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gate = #{gate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_limit_door_open = #{timeLimitDoorOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_limit_lock_open = #{timeLimitLockOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
door_alarm = #{doorAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fire_alarm = #{fireAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
key_switch = #{keySwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
data_uploadstate = #{dataUploadstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rom_available_size = #{romAvailableSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpu_freq = #{cpuFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpu_temper = #{cpuTemper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpu_unilization = #{cpuUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cpu_user_unilization = #{cpuUserUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
"internal_unilization " = #{internalUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_used = #{appUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update device_heartbeat set lock_state = #{lockState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wifi_opne = #{wifiOpne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mask = #{mask,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gate = #{gate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_limit_door_open = #{timeLimitDoorOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_limit_lock_open = #{timeLimitLockOpen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, door_alarm = #{doorAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fire_alarm = #{fireAlarm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_number = #{userNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, key_switch = #{keySwitch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_uploadstate = #{dataUploadstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rom_available_size = #{romAvailableSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpu_freq = #{cpuFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpu_temper = #{cpuTemper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpu_unilization = #{cpuUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cpu_user_unilization = #{cpuUserUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "internal_unilization " = #{internalUnilization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_used = #{appUsed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT device_heartbeat.cpu_user_unilization, device_heartbeat.rom_available_size, device_heartbeat."internal_unilization", device_.device_name,device_.company_name, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY "time" DESC) rn FROM device_heartbeat LEFT JOIN device_ ON (device_.device_id = device_heartbeat.device_id) WHERE device_heartbeat.device_id = #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) T WHERE rn = 1;
